name: Pariglide A Winter Adventure
description:
A winter-themed platformer where you collect gifts using your pariglider.

This game was made for the Secret Santa gamejam with Pilly in mind. Pilly specified he liked platformers, exploring, and music so I made an open (ish) platformer with an original soundtrack! The entire game was made in 4 days.

Please note the game does have glitches and many rough patches. I wanted to get it submitted before the time, but i may go back in and change/fix elements I don't like. As always feel free to email porterorvetti@gmail.com if you find any glitches at all or join my discord server https://discord.gg/6sX548sdRR

Porter Orvetti: Art, Code, Design,  and the Santa.
Blu: Music and positivity! 

I hope everyone enjoys!
